text:
Eureka Popcorn is a true game-changer in the world of gourmet snacks. With an extensive range of meticulously crafted flavors, it’s clear that every kernel is designed to deliver a sensory experience that tantalizes the taste buds. Each bite is a perfect balance of bold and subtle notes, showcasing the brand’s expertise in blending flavors that are both unique and satisfying.

While the price in Singapore may be considered a bit steep, those in Malaysia, however can indulge in the same exquisite flavors at a more accessible price.

In short, Eureka Popcorn offers a premium, flavorful journey that’s well worth exploring. A must-try for those who appreciate the art of popcorn and crave a snack that’s as sophisticated as it is delicious.

Left one star out coz of the pricing.. well it's understandable but I rather go to Malaysia to get it.
Overall it's good depending what flavour you willing to go to.. Service staff on that day is good , pretty much know what you going to say or ask.. taste sample first before you pick..
Recommend cheese, wasabi..
Popcorn with various flavors, such as matcha, coffee, curry, caramel, wasabi... also fish skin and potato chip. Truely, "once you pop, you can't stop"
Friendly staff and have plenty of promotions.
Eureka base is sweet, savoury flavours are made sweet in the middle too. Cant really taste the cheese.
